scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --transform ./node_modules/@as-pect/core/lib/transform/index.js --transform as-bind   --transform mscl-as-transformer --transform json-as/transform --exportRuntime --explicitStart --use ASC_RTRACE=1 --exportTable --importMemory --runtime incremental --target debug
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/index.ts --transform as-bind  --transform mscl-as-transformer --transform json-as/transform --exportRuntime --explicitStart --use ASC_RTRACE=1 --exportTable --importMemory --runtime incremental --target release
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
